Name: Kinduo
About the game: Kinduo is a local cooperative game where two elemental friends overcome obstacles to return to their island, push boxes, use electricity to connect objects, break ice blocks, blow things up and more in this cute and colorful co-op game! Single-Player! Co-op Local! (Offline) 30 stages with more than 6 different mechanics! 2 characters with several unique abilities! Play in 3 different biomes!
